segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t understand why the woman isn’t reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing in a puddle, drying dishes like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and she’s oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so excited for a cookie, but this could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cookie jar is almost empty now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes the whole scene look so ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman might slip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are working together, but they’re going to get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman even knows the stool is tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR
